Rat=鼠(1972,1984,1996,2008)
Ox=牛(1973,1985,1997,2009)
Tiger=虎(1974,1986,1998,2010)
Rabbit=兔(1975,1987,1999,2011)
Dragon=龍(1976,1988,2000,2012)
Snake=蛇(1977,1989,2001,2013)
Horse=馬(1978,1990,2002,2014)
Sheep=羊(1979,1991,2003,2015)
Monkey=猴(1980,1992,2004,2016)
Rooster=雞(1981,1993,2005,2017)
Dog=狗(1982,1994,2006,2018)
Pig=豬(1983,1995,2007,2019)
